meanings.definition: Cooked with sugar until brown and sweet.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a caramelized dessert for the guests.
meanings.sent2: The caramelized apples were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent3: The caramelized onions told sweet jokes to the other vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in caramelized hues.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of caramelized sugar filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.sent1: She caramelized the sugar to make a delicious sauce.
meanings.sent2: The onions caramelized slowly in the pan.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a caramelized banana split made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His words caramelized her heart with affection.
meanings.sent5: The heat caramelized the sugar, creating a sticky syrup.
